title: Statistical Literacy Education Curriculum Utilizing Cultural Contexts

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistical concepts (mean, standard deviation, etc.) and data visualization tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Customized materials reflecting learners' individual cultural backgrounds (region/occupation)

learning_goals: Learners can generate effective graphs/charts using real-world local community data (South Sumatra regional economic/cultural statistics).
Learners can interpret patterns/trends in provided datasets and determine statistical significance.
Learners can demonstrate critical thinking skills in evaluating the reliability and societal implications of data sources.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
